column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We went for brunch on Saturday
column2: the decor and ambience is lovely and portrays the rustic vibe similar to a whiskey saloon. There was live music which was a nice touch and probably the best part of the experience while dining
column3: although quite loud and difficult to hear the server. We received service from multiple servers
column4: which was confusing and caused miscommunication in our orders. We had to remind them of items we ordered and did not receive
column5: as well as send back food that we did not order.
